sentences.en: " Ai!'said Hung - chien with a frown, " Why do you have to tell her - "
sentences.cn: 鸿 渐 皱眉道: “ 唉! 你何必去跟她讲 —— ”

sentences.en: " No; frown, " he said. " Frown as you did before. "
sentences.cn: “ 不对, 要皱眉, " 他说, " 像你刚才那样皱眉.

sentences.en: A fiddly task like threading a needle often makes you frown.
sentences.cn: 烦琐的工作就像穿针引线一样,常常令你皱眉头.

sentences.en: A frown formed between her arched brows.
A slight frown and a laconic'Yes,'were the answer.
sentences.cn: 回答是淡淡的皱眉和一声简短的 “ 是的 ”.

sentences.en: Billy's eyebrows knitted together in a little frown.
Don't frown at me like that.
sentences.cn: 不要那样对我皱眉(不高兴).

sentences.en: He would frown on such a proposal.
sentences.cn: 他不会赞成这样的建议。

sentences.en: Her frown made her long face look even longer.
sentences.cn: 陈姨太板起粉脸对觉慧说.

sentences.en: His forehead knotted in a frown.
Kuei Chang - lin immediately knit his brows in a worried frown.
sentences.cn: 桂长林 立刻心事很重地皱了眉头.

sentences.en: She frowned as she read the letter.
She saw his frown and hastened to explain.
sentences.cn: 看到他皱起眉头，她赶紧解释。

sentences.en: There was a deep frown on the boy's face.
We can make a dimpled smile out of a frown.
sentences.cn: 我们能弄出个酒涡,使你愁容变笑靥.

sentences.en: Wu Sun - fu's irascibility appeared to have abated somewhat , for his frown disappeared.
sentences.cn: 吴荪 甫 眉毛一挺, 心头的焦躁好像减轻了些微.

phrases.tran_cn: 对…感到生气不满；对…皱眉

trans.tran_en: the expression on your face when you move your  eyebrows  together because you are angry, unhappy, or confused
to make an angry, unhappy, or confused expression, moving your  eyebrows  together
to make an angry, unhappy, or confused expression, moving your  eyebrows  together
to make an angry, unhappy, or confused expression, moving your  eyebrows  together
to make an angry, unhappy, or confused expression, moving your  eyebrows  together
